history.content: Mkuu I need help I'm suffering an addiction that is deviating me from God I don't feel strong as I used to be I have tried quitting it and confessing it God for forgiveness but I thougt I could fight it alone but I have realized I can not do it alone I feared to confess it to anyone because I feared my reputation I'm doing a deservice to my self  I spiritually weak and can not achieve my goals I set due to this addiction I know you may be surprised that it's me telling you this but I'm struggling I have realized that sin grows in the dark more and more I beg your help and I also will confess it to God help me in prayers I have a vacuum that is filled with trash I need to fill it with God that Is the reason I have taken this step to confess it (porn addiction)

Brother, thank you for your courage in sharing this. You're not alone—many struggle silently, but confession is the first step to freedom. Remember, God’s grace is sufficient, and His strength is made perfect in our weakness.  

For support and practical guidance, consider reaching out to the Advent NuruTech team or a trusted spiritual advisor. You can reach us at +254740283082.  

You are loved, you are valued, and this battle can be won.
